titles.title: Carla Walker Act of 2022
To direct the Attorney General to establish a grant program for certain State and local forensic activities, and for other purposes.
Carla Walker Act of 2022

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Carla Walker Act of 2022
This bill provides grants for state and local law enforcement agencies to conduct forensic DNA analyses in criminal investigations.
